connect20/free_admin_payment_method.name: connect20/Free_Admin_Payment_Method

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/free_admin_payment_method.description: “Free Admin Payment” can help you exceed your goals. Trusted by world leading Magento admins, it gives the best possible experience in implementing blank payment method or a demo payment method to admins.
